title: Edgar and Marion Adler Memorial Endowment for Medical Students (Distributions)
description: To provide support for the Adler MSA Award and the Adler Scholarship at the University of Colorado School of Medicine.
marketingContent:
To provide support for the Adler MSA Award and the Adler Scholarship at the University of Colorado School of Medicine.

This will support the current expenditures related to the endowment.
